original_text: Nevertheless, because of the covenant the Lord had made with David, the Lord was not willing to destroy the house of David. He had promised to maintain a lamp for him and his descendants forever.
korean_text: 여호와께서 다윗의 집을 멸하기를 즐겨하지 아니하셨음은 이전에 다윗과 더불어 언약을 세우시고 또 다윗과 그의 자손에게 항상 등불을 주겠다고 말씀하셨음이더라

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless, because of the covenant the Lord had made with David
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고, 주님께서 다윗과 맺으신 언약 때문에

sentences.original_text: the Lord was not willing to destroy the house of David
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 다윗의 집을 멸망시키려 하지 않으셨다

sentences.original_text: He had promised to maintain a lamp for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그를 위하여 등불을 유지할 것을 약속하셨다
